page.title: 16Transport- 1. Public
page.content:
Public transport to and from this area is pathetic. So much so that all children must be transported by private buses to their Secondary Schools. Children from south of the Primary School are carried by contract taxi and those from north and east come by contract bus.
Despite the fact that the area is served by two bus Companies, in a day there are only four buses to and from Perth. The latest of these goes in at 15.35pm and returns at 17.45pm. So anyone who does not have their own transport is deprived of all the social and recreational facilities of Perth.
